name: fast-mutex
description: Implementation of FastMutex for mutual exclusion locks using LocalStorage

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; $(npm bin)/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] index.js -s FastMutex -o dist/fast-mutex.js && $(npm bin)/uglifyjs dist/fast-mutex.js > dist/fast-mutex.min.js
scripts.build-test-browser: mkdir -p tmp; $(npm bin)/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] browser-test.js -o tmp/browser-test.js

author: chieffancypants
